entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -25.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lloydminster Airport 12:15 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -25.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -28.5°C
Wind: S 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
